Client boto3 SageMaker API Specs¶

data_ml_utils.boto3_botocore_client.client_sagemaker.AwsSagemakerServices¶

class data_ml_utils.boto3_botocore_client.client_sagemaker.AwsSagemakerServices¶
Initialises sagemaker client.

:param : None.

The AwsSagemakerServices class does not take in any parameters to initialise it.

get_model_uri_from_aws_model_registry¶

get_model_uri_from_aws_model_registry(model_name: str)¶
retrieve approved model artefact uri from AWS model registry
Parameters

model_name (str) – name of model group in AWS model registry

Returns

targz_file_uri; model artefact uri

Return type

str

Returns

file; filename of model artefact

Return type

str

unzip_targz_file¶

unzip_targz_file(file_targz: str, bucket_name_trunc: str, targz_file_uri: str, s3_file_path: str)¶
unzip model artefact file
Parameters

  • file_targz (str) – filename of model artefact

  • bucket_name_trunc (str) – truncated s3 bucket directory

  • targz_file_uri (str) – model artefact uri

  • s3_file_path (str) – file path to file in s3 bucket

Returns

non exit function value if successful

Return type

int

upload_retrained_model_s3¶

upload_retrained_model_s3(date_format: str, bucket_name_trunc: str, s3_file_path: str, model_suffix: str)¶
upload model artefact to s3
Parameters

  • date_format (str) – date format for file name

  • bucket_name_trunc (str) – truncated s3 bucket directory

  • s3_file_path (str) – file path to file in s3 bucket

  • model_suffix (str) – model file name suffix

Returns

model_file_name; model artefact filename

Return type

str

create_model_package_version¶

create_model_package_version(
model_name: str,
model_file_name: str,
current_retrained_model_metrics_dict: str,
s3_directory: str,
image_uri: str,
model_package_description: str
)
create model package version in AWS model registry
Parameters

  • model_name (str) – model group name

  • model_file_name (str) – model artefact filename

  • current_retrained_model_metrics_dict (Dict) – evaluation metrics of retrained and current model

  • s3_directory (str) – s3 directory

  • image_uri (str) – model ecr image uri

  • model_package_description (str) – model package description

Returns

non exit function value if successful

Return type

int
